entities.name: ProgramEnrollment Analytical Scripts
observations: Sophisticated SQL-based data analysis scripts that CREATE historical program transition data by analyzing course completion patterns
Primary script: final_program_enrollment_data.sql - uses complex algorithms to detect academic majors from signature course completion (3+ courses required)
Uses CASE statements to determine derived_major based on course completion counts: BAD (Business Admin), FIN (Finance), TOU (Tourism), INT (International Relations), TES (TESOL)
Analyzes both language program enrollments (IEAP, EHSS, GESL) and academic program enrollments with graduation status detection
Quality assessment: 9.5/10 - exceptionally well-designed analytical scripts with comprehensive data analysis capabilities
Located in naga-backend_version_0 but was missing from current monorepo until copied to backend/scripts/legacy_analysis/
Creates audit trails for program changes and handles joint program detection (overlapping/consecutive enrollments)
Integrates multiple data sources: course records, student data, grades, and enrollment dates for complete program transition history
⚠️ DEPRECATED: SchoolStructuralUnit model references in scripts are now obsolete
Scripts reference SchoolStructuralUnit.objects.filter() calls that need updating to new standard models
MAJOR_CODE_MAP translations (BAD->Business Administration, etc.) need remapping to current model structure
Import scripts will require significant refactoring due to model changes from MPTT to standard Django models

entities.name: PostgreSQL MCP Fix
observations: PostgreSQL MCP server connection fix for Docker-based PostgreSQL
Correct command format: claude mcp add postgres npx -- -y @modelcontextprotocol/server-postgres postgresql://debug:debug@IP:5432/DATABASE
The '-y' flag must be passed after '--' to npx to auto-install the package
Use host machine IP address (not localhost) when PostgreSQL runs in Docker
Get IP with: ipconfig getifaddr en0
Verify connection with: claude mcp list | grep postgres
Common failure: Missing 'npx' command or incorrect '-y' flag placement

entities.name: Claude MCP Configuration
observations: Claude Code MCP config stored in: /Users/jeffreystark/.claude.json
Different from Claude Desktop config at: ~/Library/Application Support/Claude/claude_desktop_config.json
Claude Code uses separate MCP servers from Claude Desktop
Config file can be very large (3MB+) as it contains conversation history
MCP servers managed with: claude mcp add/remove/list commands

_note: This is a partial export showing the most recent entities. Use mcp__memory__read_graph for complete export.
